name: The Extra-Terrible
description:
It's December 1982... you got a game for the holidays,...you were so excited....little did you know it was the Worst Game Ever.
Relive the old days with this 2020's remake of THAT game.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created in one week for the Beginners Circle Jam #1.The theme of the jam was '1980s'.

Music was made by SirPython

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fullscreen recommended.

Shift to run. 

WASD/Arrow keys to move.
